summary: Mara is an orphan from honorhall orphanage, she is adopted by maramal and became a priestess at the temple of mara
descriptionHtml:
***NO REQUIRED FILES*** ***NO REQUIRED FILES*** ***NO REQUIRED FILES*** ***NO REQUIRED FILES***

OPTIONAL REQUIRED FILES :
Pretty Face : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/?
( this mod is the one i use when i made Mara, and also the mod i use for screen shot, if you have other face mod, that will be okay too )
RECOMMENDED MOD :
Amazing Follower Tweaks : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?
DIMONIZED UNP female body : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?

Biography :
Mara is an orphan from honorhall orphanage, she is adopted by maramal and became a priestess at the temple of mara

She is 15 years old girl, she is located at Temple of Mara, her body is shorter compared to other people, because she is still teenager!
She is Marriable, and she also can cook! glass armor and weapon isn't included!, she have 2 steel dagger for her weapon! , she is not overpowered(unless you play below adept mode) , and she leveling up with you! she is protected and only the player can kill her, but dont worry if you accidentally kill her, she will respawn at the temple again!

Pardon my english, enjoy playing with this cute little priestess as your follower!
Future Plan :
- Add Quest
- Add Unique Voice
- Add New Armor

This is my very first mod, but i will improve this mod as much as i can! Leave a like if you like it, let me know if there's a bug in this mod, also leave a comment, i am open for critics and suggestion

Thanks for Apachii to give me permission to use her files to make this mod stand-alone mod
ApachiiSkyHair : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
author: Indraappleseed
